thumb.name: Special People Like You
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're%3Cbr%3Ea Special%3Cbr%3EFriend.%3Cbr%3EJessica%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBirthdays are the perfect time%3Cbr%3Efor remembering special people%3Cbr%3Ewhose friendship means so much all year -%3Cbr%3Especial people like you!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Stages of Life
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn your birthday. Colleen%3Cbr%3EI%26#146;d like to remind you%3Cbr%3Ethat there are six stages%3Cbr%3Ein a woman's life:%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStage 1%3Cbr%3EBaby%3Cbr%3EStage 2%3Cbr%3EGirl%3Cbr%3EStage 3%3Cbr%3ETeenager%3Cbr%3EStage 4%3Cbr%3EYoung Woman%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStage 5%3Cbr%3EYoung Woman%3Cbr%3EStage 6%3Cbr%3EYoung Woman%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You Make a Difference
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJessica.%3Cbr%3EIn you I see...%3Cbr%3EA free spirit%3Cbr%3Ewho laughs%3Cbr%3Eand dreams%3Cbr%3Eand dances%3Cbr%3Ewith the wind...%3Cbr%3Ea woman%3Cbr%3Eof creativity%3Cbr%3Eand courage...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...a friend%3Cbr%3Ewhose smile%3Cbr%3Eand love%3Cbr%3Eand words%3Cbr%3Eof wisdom%3Cbr%3Emake such%3Cbr%3Ea difference%3Cbr%3Ein my life.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou'll always be%3Cbr%3Especial to me.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Sunny-day. Funny-day
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Eto you.%3Cbr%3E Robyn...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...my sunny-day.%3Cbr%3Efunny-day friend!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: This Is Your Year
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's Your Birthday. Mike%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFly high.%3Cbr%3ELive large.%3Cbr%3EDream big.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis is your year.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You and Me Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou and Me. way back when...%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday. Dana%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThe maturity level%3Cbr%3Ehasn't really changed%3Cbr%3Ea bit. has it?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Birthday%3Cbr%3Eto a Terrific Friend
